# Armillary Amulet
## Overview
**Aura** faint divination; **CL** 5th

**Slot** neck

**Price** 2,500 gp

**Weight** â€”

**Description**

This thin chain of silvery-gray metal holds a series of interlocking rings that slowly turn within themselves in an accurate replication of the celestial sphere. The amulet grants its wearer a +5 competence bonus on [[Spellcraft (Skill)|Spellcraft]] checks. It also grants immunity to the dangerous effects of the Orrery of Nal-Kashel.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], creator must have 5 ranks in the [[Spellcraft (Skill)|Spellcraft]] skill

**Cost** 1,250gp

**Source:** From Shore to Sea, pg. 17
